text: The University of Notre Dame (or simply Notre Dame) is a private Catholic university near South Bend, Indiana. It was founded in 1842 by Father Edward Sorin of the Congregation of Holy Cross. Sorin was also the school's first president. In the beginning, it was an all-male school. In 1972 females were admitted. The university has five colleges and one professional school. Notre Dame offers master's degrees and doctoral degrees. The university's undergraduates live on campus in single-gendered residence halls. Alumni are located around the world. The school's athletic teams are known as the Fighting Irish. ==Related pages== * Notre Dame Stadium == Notes == == Other websites == * University of Notre Dame * Notre Dame Fighting Irish, the Official Athletic Site * Campus map Category:Colleges and universities in Indiana Category:Christian colleges and universities in the United States Category:Association of American Universities Category:Atlantic Coast Conference Category:Hockey East Category:1842 establishments in the United States Category:19th-century establishments in Indiana
title: University of Notre Dame
